levelList.name: Thoracalgia
levelList.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% more damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect

[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, gain 2 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 2 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count

levelList.name: Thoracalgia
levelList.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% more damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
<style="highlight">- Gain 1 [Breath] for every ally targeted by this Skill (max 2)</style>

[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, gain 2 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain <style="highlight">4</style> [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">- Recover half of SP used by this Skill</style>

coindescs.desc: <style="highlight">Deal +([Breath] Potency + Count)% more damage on Critical Hit (max 20%)</style>

levelList.name: Thoracalgia
levelList.abName: Sleeping Bag of a Bygone Day
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the least HP (prioritizes allies)
If an ally is one of this Skill's targets, deal +30% more damage

[BeforeAttack] At less than 15 [Breath], consume 10% HP to gain 5 [Breath] and +5 [Breath] Count
- Cannot be Staggered or defeated due to this effect
- Gain <style="highlight">2</style> [Breath] for every ally targeted by this Skill (max <style="highlight">4</style>)

[EndSkill] If the target is defeated, gain 3 [HoldingBreath] next turn. (once per turn) If the said target was an ally, activate the following as well:
- Allies that are made to participate or are Substituted into this Encounter due to the defeated allies gain 4 [Breath] and +<style="highlight">4</style> [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">- Recover SP used by this Skill and regain 1 of each E.G.O resources consumed</style>
